segments.text: I see the kids sneaking cookies, and it’s actually kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching as high as he can to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting so patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how focused they are on their little mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, which makes it even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she’s just drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious she is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, but the boy doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, but in a really amusing way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments that will be funny later, even if it’s a mess now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m just enjoying watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
